item.title: Apple shelved the idea of integrating Meta’s AI models over privacy concerns, report says
item.description:
Days after the Wall Street Journal reported that Apple and Meta were in talks to integrate the latter’s AI models, Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman said that the iPhone maker was not planning any such move. Apple held talks with Meta about the possibility of a partnership when it was also talking with other companies. However, the […]

item.title: TechWolf raises $43M to take an AI-sized bite out of the internal recruiting game
item.description:
TechWolf has built an AI engine that ingests data from internal workflows to learn about the people doing that work.

item.title: Gmail's Gemini AI sidebar and email summaries are rolling out now - The Verge
item.description:
1. Gmail's Gemini AI sidebar and email summaries are rolling out now  The Verge
  2. Gemini side panel officially rolling out to Gmail, Google Docs, more  9to5Google
  3. Gmail gets AI-powered "Summarize" feature on iOS and Android, Gemini side panel on the web  PhoneArena
  4. Gmail rolling out Gemini-powered Summarize to Android, iOS  9to5Google
  5. Gemini Will Now Summarize Email Threads on Gmail Android  Tech Times

item.title: AMD pulverizes Nvidia's RTX 4090 in popular Geekbench OpenCL benchmark — but you will need a small mortgage to buy AMD's fastest GPU ever produced
Score a Windows 11 Pro lifetime license for under £20 (yes, really)
item.description: Save 87% on a lifetime license to Microsoft Windows 11 Pro at the Mashable Shop. Pay only £19.68 for a limited time.
